archimate:Requirement.name: BA.2.1.11c: c) checks should be performed to ensure that the applications can be supported on a continuing basis (e.g. by an individual or a group of individuals skilled in developing EUDA).
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
